description: We will prepare together some good Italian dishes, main course, second and dessert!( and sometimes surprises of Italian origin will be awaiting for you!) It will be fun, each of you will prepare the 3 courses , so that everyone will know how to make it again at home!While doing so, I'll tell you stories about the ingredients , the regional secrets and my personal ones... You don't need to bring anything, a part a notebook if you'd like to take your own notes! but you will receive the notes about the recipes and tips !And tools and cooking aprons will be ready for you! Just be punctual so that we can have more time to share together! Everyone is welcome, also people with limitations in food, i'll be able to prepare particular menus for everyone! My idea is to teach the real regional recipes, not the ones of the restaurants, can you imagine how many small villages are in Italy and each with its own well kept secret? Can you imagine having here in Brussels all these things coming to you? So niiice! :-)
name: Let's meetup and cook Italian! A complete Italian meal, wine included!

description: Hi Turquoise friends! I have 7 free entrances to come with me ad visit and taste and give it a trial at this food presentation: wine, cheeses, pasta, olive oil, delicatessen and pastries from Calabria, the Region of my mum's family! More people can join, but the first responding yes will have the free ticket! Is a good occasion to discover with me the good flavors of Italy and meet before new courses!
name: ARTE IN TAVOLA, Event at Grand Place

description:
The new Autumn Winter[masked] has begun!!

Cycle debuted on November 25, 2012; second course for Christmas preparation, this 22nd of  December, next course the 13th of January and the following in February, date to be defined!

Time: All classes are held from 5.00 PM to 7.30 PM, followed by the nice Table Turquoise Dinner, wine included, to share the preparations!

Location: Rue des Tongres - Merode- at my nice home place (details shared with the participants)

Participation to the costs: 25 Euros per class, 90 euros if you decide to take 4 classes!

Attention: Reservation and payment is required on the spot or  previous to this course! (contact me for payment details)

Would like to know more? To know payments details?

contact me, at [masked] or here on Meetup!
name: Let's meet up and cook Italian for Christmas!

description: Were we indulging during our holidays? Healthy recipes and cooking tips to be back on track without giivng up flavor and happiness! Let's detox our bodies cooking together getting back on track with smiles on our faces!
name: Healthy but tasty Italian Dinner to detox after holidays!!

description: This is the last cooking class of the autumn-winter period[masked] Still, we need to be cuddled, warmth and protected from the winter's last cold days and welcome the next sunny spring-summer courses!
name: Let's cook together to say goodbye to winter!

description:
The new cooking classes of the spring-summer period are starting with some great Italian recipes from the Italian gastronomy's Maestri.

Learn how to prepare an elegant and inventive menu and serve it as you were a Master Chef!


A good and accurate presentation will give your guests a great appreciation!

 

Reminder: This is a cooking class, and we will all try to put our hand on : is not a demonstration; at the end we will share the nice Table Turquoise and the dishes prepared together. 3 bottles of wine will be offered for a table of 10. If you wish and feel so, you can bring your own drinks, remembering this is an Advanced Cooking Class where skills and participation are needed.
name: Start as a Master Chef the Spring-Summer Italian Cooking Classes!

description: My father was a passionate man, and in his spare time, quite every sunday he was cooking for friends that were telling him: "why don't you open a restaurant?" All his recipes are written by hand and I'll enjoy pass it to be shared again and again, and remembered!
name: Let's cook together my father's old recipes!

description:
Hi friends,

Graziella, a friend of mine and myself, we are repeating (after a huge success last year!) a kind of " flea market"' sale of women's clothes, at my place!
Come to renew your wardrobe , for twice nothing, at Gaia' adress, from 3 to 20 euros!
We'll be happy to welcome you on Sunday the 5th of May from 2PM till 6PM !
The adress: rue des tongres 16 - you can ring the bell at GORINI , the door is "hidden" in between the windows of the shoe shop ARNOST!

 

GRAZIELLA E GAIA
name: Second hand clothes and Kitchen items sale!

description:
Launching the first "FOOD COOKING CELEBRATION! "

 

to honor the Food Revolution Day 2013! Let's have fun all together! This is a celebration,  a way to know the recipes you love and to stimulate you to cook! Simple dishes, also tried for the very first time and discovered on the net are very welcome!

 


Here how to participate:


Participants should bring their dish, write the recipe, in order for me, lately to copy them and  distribute it to the other participants! It will be a way for everyone to have the "souvenir" of the evening!

 

each participant can ONLY participate in ONE category:


STARTER -

FIRST COURSE -

SECOND COURSE -

or

DESSERT


MAX. Number of Participants: 5 per Category


Access fee: 10 Euros

 

All the dishes should be ready  if they are cold, or just warmed  in my kitchen  if they are hot!

 

I will announce when a Category wil be full ( remember, max 5 participants per Category)

 

The best dish of each Category will be Awarded!


AWARDS!!!!!

1 cooking class  at  Gaia " La Table Turquoise"  for each first prize of the categories and more surprises!...
name: THE GREAT FOOD COOKING CELEBRATION!

description:
BEGINNERS CLASSES:

These classes are not demonstrations- you will each be preparing and cooking all your own food, with me guiding you.

In each class, you'll learn several new skills to add to your foundation.

You’ll be able to competently cook a series of dishes, and have the foundations to ‘wing it’ on many more.

 

Note: the wine offered will be of 3 bottles per table of 10, please bring your own bottle if you'd like to!
name: Cooking with Gaia, Beginners Class - June

description:
Join for a double session to fight our hectic times! My friend Michela, professional relaxation therapist and myself, naturopathe nutritionist, willing to guide you for a "journey" made of nutritional advices, stress management and 15' minutes relaxation massage.
Minimum 3 , maximum 7 persons
Session duration 2 hours.
name: Stress relief through nutrition and relaxation

description:
ADVANCED COOKING CLASSES

THIS COURSE NEEDS TECHNICAL KITCHEN SKILLS,

THIS COURSE IS NOT FOR PEOPLE THAT HAVE NO EXPERIENCE IN COOKING.

Note: this is a class with dinner, we will have fun but we will seriously work on the food preparation.

The classes will be based on regional, traditional and innovative Italian cuisine plus digressions on other countries and Ideas for Menu design and Food pairs plus presentation techniques.

 

Please note that these classes will not preview more than 3 bottles of wine per table of 10 people.
name: Cooking with Gaia Advanced Class - June

description:
Join for a double session to fight our hectic times! My friend Michela, professional relaxation therapist and myself, naturopathe nutritionist, willing to guide you for a "journey" made of nutritional advices, stress management and 15' minutes relaxation massage.
Minimum 3 , maximum 5 persons
Session duration 2 hours.

description:
BEGINNERS CLASSES:

These classes are not demonstrations- you will each be preparing and cooking all your own food, with me guiding you.

In each class, you'll learn several new skills to add to your foundation.

You’ll be able to competently cook a series of dishes, and have the foundations to ‘wing it’ on many more.

 

Note: the wine offered will be of 3 bottles per table of 10, please bring your own bottle if you'd like to!
name: Cooking with Gaia, Beginners Class - July

description:
Dear foodlovers, for an exceptional reason, having some friends passing in Brussels and willing to learn home made Ravioli preparation, I created this class, where 5 places are available! Please do not cancel your participation at the clas of 6 and 13 of July, as it will make confusion and you wil not leave other people of the group the opportunity to register.

 

Payment is required at the moment of registration, on the bank accountof Alessandra Gorini[masked] , marking your name and GET TOGETHER 10th of JULY
name: Exceptional Ravioli Session with different summer fillings
Advanced Class - Cooking with Gaia

description:
Let's learn how to make a meal only with Foams! This course is preparatory for a future one on Molecular Cuisine!
A mousse is a prepared food that incorporates air bubbles to give it a light and airy texture. It can range from light and fluffy to creamy and thick, depending on preparation techniques. A mousse may be sweet or savory. Dessert mousses are typically made with whipped egg whites or whipped cream, and generally flavored with chocolate or puréed fruit For savory mousse, hard boiled egg, fish or liver may be used.
name: Special issue: Mousse, Foam, Espuma!
Pasta! End of summer Cooking Class! (Also for people with gluten restriction!)

description:
“The Cook’s escapes to Italy is all about landscapes, people, products, cooking, history, lifestyle, shopping, new friends!


Join us for a memorable week of culinary and recreational activities in the historical area of Castelli Romani —30 minutes from Rome. Come live the countryside lifestyle!


Guests can elect on a daily basis to take one or more activities or skip a session and just chill out and enjoy the facilities and the surroundings.


Classes are small enough to accommodate cooks of all levels, yet large enough to allow you to make friends from all over the world. Classes are ideal for groups of family and friends who travel together.

For lovers of Italian food, we offer a unique hands-on opportunity to participate in local cook. And locals will share their techniques, special ingredients, and family recipes. Our classes are ideal for cooks at all experience levels. And you’ll join them a tavola to enjoy what you’ve prepared.

Program Italy 2013 – Castelli Romani


Tuesday 10th of September


Arrival preferably at Ciampino Airport or in alternative, Fiumicino -Leonardo da Vinci

Transfer to the Agriturismo “ Il Giardino di Giupi “

Time to discover the rooms and relax at the beautiful places

6.00 PM        Pick up time,  2 min. transfer to reach the Villa “Le Bouganville “

Discoverthe “ Escape “: meet the Hosts and discover the amazing program of the week

The Products: learn how to prepare a local fancy cocktail

Taste: La Cucina di Flora, the local owner

10.00 PM       Relaxing Healing Time before bed time

Wednesday the 11th of September


8.30  AM                 Your Breakfast Relaxing Time

9.30   AM                 Pick up time, transfer to the Villa

10.30 – 2.30 PM       Learn and Taste: 1st Cooking Class

the genuine countryside’s Italian Cuisine and enjoy what you prepared

3.00 – 6.00 PM         Relax at the Pool

6.00  PM                  Pick up time

the Products:

another great Italian Cocktail with cheeses and appetizers

8.00   PM                  Dinner Time  in Lanuvio

relax and have fun at a local “ Fraschetta “

10.00 PM                  the Products: taste the real and unique Italian Gelato!

Thursday the 12th of September


8.30 AM               Your Breakfast Relaxing Time

9.30  AM               Pick Up time

9.45 – 11.30 AM    Discover:  the Italian art of making bread, cakes and salami.

11.45 AM              the Products: The Italian wine adventure

Discover: one of the best local wine producers

12.45 AM              Discover: Learn how to match cheese and wines

2.30    PM             Escape: the Surroundings, Nemi and the area,

with local incredible natural beauties

5.00    PM              Return to the Agriturismo and relaxing time at the Pool

7.30    PM              Dinner Time : the local organic food at “Il  Giardino di Giupi  “

Friday the 13th of September


8.30 AM                 Your Breakfast Relaxing Time

9.30 AM                 Discover: the local markets and “ feel the products”

this is the right time to buy your special Italian foods and bring it at home!

12.30 AM               Taste:      La cucina di Flora

1.30 – 5PM            Relax at the pool with possibility to book a massage

5.00   PM               Learn and Taste: 2nd Cooking Class

while enjoying our Italian glasses of wine and enjoy what you prepared

10.30 PM               Relaxing healing time before bed time

Saturday the 14th of September


8.30   AM                Your Breakfast Relaxing Time

9.30   AM                Pick Up time

10.00 AM                Learn and Taste: 3rd Cooking Class, enjoy what you prepared!

2.00    PM               Escape: the Surroundings: Castel Gandolfo

Summer Residence of the Pope

3.30    PM               Escape: on the road to reach  “Eataly”

we pass by the Basilica of S. Paolo

4.00    PM               the Products: free time to visit “ Eataly “

this is the time for Cook’s Shopping!

5.00  PM                   Learn and Taste: Cocktail and Dinner Time

with a real genuine Italian cooking Food lover and passionate artist, at her original                                                          home place!

9.00  PM                  Departure for the Agriturismo

Sunday  the 15th of September


8.30 AM                     Your Breakfast Relaxing Time

9.30 AM                     Relaxing time at the pool

12.00 AM                   Learn and taste:

the Farewell drink , Tramezzini and Bruschette

13.00  AM                  Departures for Ciampino Airport

 


Cooking lessons and side events


Limited to 10 hands on students, you will be under the guidance of Gaia, biologist and naturopath nutritionist who has extensive knowledge of the Italian Cuisine and world cuisine, check her cooking classes in Brussels, here: www.gaiaforgaia.org


Gaia will guide you through the selection, preparation, healthy cooking techniques and sharing of a nice table of what you have created together.


Guests will also learn from the owner Caterina, who prepares most lunches, learning from her extensive repertoire of Calabria’s dishes, taking maximum advantage of seasonal vegetables and herbs from organic gardens and local markets.


There will be 3 Culinary sessions Experiences for the 6 day holiday, and 2 for the 4 day holidays.


Anna, your international professional event organizer, will make you discover the local taste, touch and atmosphere!


Wine and events: In September, gourmet lovers will meet the famous local producers of wine and will have the real opportunity of meeting the real Slow Food actors, through visit to famous Cantine and visit of vineyards.


In Genzano, you will visit the most famous Bakery of Lazio, where you will be served by people dressed with traditional folkloric costumes.


Contribution to the costs


The program includes 5 night’s accommodation, all meals of the week including wine, 3 cooking classes, sightseeing, 1 winery visits and tastings, Pecorino and other cheese tastings and visits to local markets and historical towns, relaxation moments, use of the swimming-pool,  a farewell gift. We do provide transportation during the week for all activities.

 

6 days/5nights - 1200 Euros per person
(1100 Euros if you already participated to 2 Cooking Classes Gaia “ la Table Turquoise”)


This formula can be transformed in a
4days/3nights – 965 Euros
(865 Euros if you already participated to 2 Cooking Classes Gaia “ la Table Turquoise”)


In this case, we suggest the departure on Thursday, to take full advantage of the Program.


A deposit of 300 Euros is required at the time of booking. The balance is due 2 months before the start of the program, which means the 10th of July 2013. Cancellations received 120 days before the start of the program will receive a full refund.


Not included in the fee: Airfare and Traveling Insurance: the organizers will not be responsible for any kind of accident related to individual medical, travel, cooking activities, events.
We recommend that participants are covered by their own travel insurance policies

 

How an holiday with us can make a difference!


We aim to provide our guests with an unforgettable elegant countryside Italian experience.

Moreover,
Natural producers and suppliers of goods and services use local products as well as vineyards producers


In the area, guests can purchase local products and doing so, they will help the local area producers ( wine, cheeses, biscuits, salami, etc)


We will visit local restaurants and take wine tastings and we will suggest you local visits, churches, local walks.


A local knowledge goes a long way! It turns a good holiday into a truly memorable one. You will experience special places and people who live and work in the destination and who have fallen in love with it!


So, traveling with us is not just a brief stay somewhere, it’s a real connection with the people, the landscape, the culture and the environment. It’s like really living somewhere and enjoying the peace and quiet or the pace and excitements of the place as much as the people who live there do..

 

Anna and Gaia

venue.name: FoodMood, a Cook Escape to Italy!

name: Launching the first "Cook Escape" to Italy!Travel with us to escape the routine!

description:
Dear Food lovers ! This Session is for the people who already attended Session 1 and desire to follow step by step our Program! 

 My friend Michela, professional relaxation therapist and myself, naturopathe nutritionist, willing to guide you for a "journey" made of nutritional advices, stress management.
Minimum 6 maximum 8 persons
Session duration 2 hours.

During the Session you will taste DETOX finger food to fight stress, you'll go through a guided relaxation and a short back massage. 

PARTICIPATION TO THE FEES 40 EUROS

description:
Join for a double session to fight our hectic times! My friend Michela, professional relaxation therapist and myself, naturopathe nutritionist, willing to guide you for a "journey" made of nutritional advices, stress management.
Minimum 6 maximum 8 persons
Session duration 2 hours.

During the Session you will taste special herbal teas, you'll go through a guided relaxation and a short back massage.

PARTICIPATION TO THE FEES 40 EUROS
name: Stress reliefs through nutrition and relaxation - Session 1

description: Learn how to detox your body through easy basic practices , based on drinks, foods and relaxation techniques!
name: Detox trough nutrition and relaxation
Let's cook together a detox menu to start boost our defenses!

description:
We will prepare together some good Italian dishes, main course, second and dessert!( and sometimes surprises of Italian origin will be awaiting for you!)It will be fun, each of you will prepare the 3 courses , so that everyone will know how to make it again at home!While doing so, I'll tell you stories about the ingredients , the regional secrets and my personal ones...You don't need to bring anything, a part a notebook if you'd like to take your own notes! but you will receive the notes about the recipes and tips !And tools and cooking aprons will be ready for you! Just be punctual so that we can have more time to share together!Everyone is welcome, also people with limitations in food, i'll be able to prepare particular menus for everyone!My idea is to teach the real regional recipes, not the ones of the restaurants, can you imagine how many small villages are in Italy and each with its own well kept secret? Can you imagine having here in Brussels all these things coming to you? So niiice! :-)

Moreover, as a nutritionist and volunteer Ambassadors for Jamie Oliver, in Belgium, I only use natural and organic products and y recipes are all promoting the slow food movement and natural flavory cooking!
name: Let's meet up and cook Italian! A complete Italian meal, wine included!

description:
This is a special event for some of you to just seat down and relax and taste what I'll cook for you, to remind some of the best recipes you prepared and taste some new!
10 places maximum and reservation accepted only after payement!

At the menu: 

Pommegranade cocktail

Starters: St. Jacques on a celeriac and black pepper puré, Millefeuille of  Madagascar Shrimps in a citrus paste, Avocado and Crab roulade with a black olive paté

Primi piatti: Tagliatelle sauce artichoke - Mushrooms Porcini Lasagne 

Main dish: Pork Cotechino with its Spinach in a home made puff pastry -Beetroots croutons and ancient apples  with their Truffle and Reggiano Bechamel. 

Desserts: Aspic of wintery fruits and Lambrusco and Giant Pavlova with red berries 

Home made chocolates and coffee pearls.
name: Special Christmas dinner to celebrate 1 year of italian cooking!!

description: We will taste different type of wines and you'll find a looot of nice appetizers that you will be able to reproduce at home for your festivities or every day life! And I'll wish you a real happy Christmas, of course! ;)
name: Let's meet up for an Italian Aperitivo before Christmas!

description:
THIS CLASS IS UNFORTUNATELY CANCELLED DUE TO A LAST MINUTE CHANGING WORK SCHEDULE FROM MY SIDE!!

 You need a break from your holidays? Want to learn how to purify your precious body enjoying a super italian cooking? Well, this class is for you! How to loose liquids and toxins enjoying what you eat with your friends!
name: Healthy but tasty dinner to Detox after holidays!

description:
Balancing your body's energies is as easy as looking at the foods you eat:
the 6 tastes make us feel satisfied and ensure major nutrients!
name: Let's cook and satisfy our 6 senses!

description: An exceptional day to mix and match cooking with clothes shopping! A " chic brocante" on a sunday AFTERNOON!
name: Exceptional cooking and clothes sale!

description:
The term gateau (gatto'or gato' for Napolitans), is a French word that means cake, in Italian is indicating a sort of salted cake, flan...discover with me the secrets and the story of this ancient recipe and spread the good italian tradition with your friends! This very rich dish is made in Campania and Sicily: my grand mother had a special recipe that I'll share with you! 

Hands on and demonstration, aprons, recipe and tools! 

After the preparation , we'll taste and eat it all together with some good italian wine!
name: Workshop: The original MAIN COURSE DISH, Gateau di Patate!

description: Dear food lovers, join me for a cooking session with the best sauces to fill special pastas! Taste the wine and enjoy the dinner!!
name: Pasta!! My dad's best recipes! Wine! Taste some good italian wines!

description: Door is "hidden" in between the windows of the shoe shop ARNOST, ring the bell at GORINI!
name: Ravioli and cappelletti! Emilia-Romagna at its best!

description: So many possibilities! Delicious fresh pasta with natural colored ingredients to create different veritable  tasty chef d'oeuvres!
name: Let's go for colored pasta this time!

description: It's new, it's cool, is an alternative! Come in the middle of the week for a different after office break, enjoy the originality of the place, the food, the company and overall good italian wines! MINIMUM NUMBER 8 PEOPLE MAXIMUM 20!
name: Aperitivo con Polenta! Apéro Polenta!

description:
The Italian getaway! 

Get a cooking lesson, share your love of food and inspire others to get excited too, about healthy and natural ingredients! 


Calling all grown-ups to support the Food Revolutions actions taking place all over the world! 

The food revolution day is Friday 16th but we will cook together on saturday the 17th!
name: LET'S COOK ITALIAN TO HONOR THE FOOD REVOLUTION DAY!

description:
Eat and drink your way to relaxation!

Come to discover and live a practical session to change the perceptions you have on nutrition, through relaxation.

Food is about life as well as a luxury.

Mindset can affect feelings of physical satiety :the brain can be tricked into either feeling full or feeling unsatisfied. That feeling depends on what people believed they are consuming rather than what they actually are consuming.
name: Nutrition and relaxation

description:
Come to learn how to digest aliments easily, perform special exercises to learn tips and tricks, exerce your mouth and mind to guide you through no bloating, no stress and easy digestion!

Session will take place for minimum number of 6 people to maximum number of 10
name: Nutrition and relaxation

description: Have a dinner with the best pleasant dishes to burn fats without suffering,  and enjoy!

description:
Come to learn how to digest aliments easily, perform special exercises to learn tips and tricks, exerce your mouth and mind to guide you through no bloating, no stress and easy digestion!

description:
This evening is designed for lovers of wines and not necessarily for wine experts; Italian wines will be honored! 

"Wine-down" from your busy day in the coziness and grandeur of my  original living room! 

The evening starts at 7.30 with the opportunity to meet and mingle with the other guests. You will find information about the wines you'll be tasting.


In total,  1 bottle will be available for each guests under the form of 8 half glasses.
If you like, you can buy your additional own bottle paying the price of it, plus the " droit de bouchon" of 5 euros.

The participation to the expenses is of 20 euro per person or 25 euro per person, if you like to taste italian delicatessen, organic cheeses and charcuteries with breads. Please write me here what would you like to subscribe for!
name: Italian wines hours!

description:
<b style="font-size : 16px">You ‘d like and want to take a break , but you do not want to move, traveling is too expensive or too hectic for just 2 days.. You’d like to go to a Spa but is too expensive…


So…Have you ever thought of not moving around and receive a full weekend at your home town place to distress, relax and moreover fully motivate yourself for the start of the week? Have you ever thought of a pause in these hectic days, in a beautiful apartment to greatly be dynamic and fully energized but at the same time relaxed, feeling that you did something new, fun and enjoyable for your life?


A workshop in Brussels: one day to relax, one day to energize and start the week ahead!

Saturday


 - Morning: welcome and starting of the day 10 AM with breathing relaxation, cleansing with juice and waters, detox, music and atmosphere to enter the day

- Cooking class 1 relaxing food 

- Lunch and digestion moments - a walk in the park ,music and guided relaxing moments


- Light Cooking session 2 Prepare your own dish for the evening to bring at home

- Late afternoon Meditation and preparation of cosmetics plus head massage

 Sunday 

- Active walking, Breathing exercise and energizing drinks and foods to enter your energizing day!

- Cooking class 2: dynamic food Lunch and digestion moments

- Late afternoon  Preparing for the week ahead: motivational workshop and food advices, energizing exercises to use during the week 

MIN NUMBER OF PARTICIPANTS,    3


MAX NUMBER  OF PARTICIPANTS, 6

Formula 1 – SATURDAY ONLY        Participation to the expenses 100 Euros per person

Formula 2-  SUNDAY ONLY            Participation to the expenses 100 Euros per person

Formula 3 -  SATURDAY AND SUNDAY Participation to the expenses 180 per person 

When you book, please specify with a message which formula are you booking!

All the outside activities are subject to weather conditions - The organizer will be free to change the sequence of the events if needed. 

What to bring, how to dress: bring some tupperware to bring home your food and cosmetics; dress in comfort, shoes to walk and stand comfortably. Bring a tshirt to change if needed. Your own knives if you'd like to cut with them

You will find: socks, yoga mats, cushions, aprons, tools to prepare your food and cosmetics, music, candles, scents, blankets.  

Wine is not allowed for the two days, juices, water and tea will be our drinks.

              Very happy to welcome and spend a quality time with you!

                                                             Gaia
name: A full week-end to cook, relax, prepare cosmetics and motivate yourself!

description:
Come to watch the round of 16 while tasting Italian wines!
Reach at 4.00 PM to see Colombia - Uruguay !

This evening is designed for football lovers and lovers of wines and not necessarily for wine experts; Italian wines will be honored in the coziness and grandeur of my original living room! The afternoon starts at 4.00 with the opportunity to meet and mingle with the other guests before the first match starts!

name: World Cup and Wines' hours!

description:
Dear food lovers, I will held a series of special classes through Italian Michelin and Master dishes to get you inspired and show you a range of easy techniques that will impress your future guests; you’ll get inside tips that make cooking a pleasure and a success.
This session, will be dedicated to Cappe sante (Scallops, Coquille St. Jacques ).
name: Special: Cappe Sante, Italian Master Recipes!

description:
Naturopathic Nutrition stresses the use of whole and organic foods as medicine - an integral concept of healing in many indigenous societies. Today, we see that a return to chemical-free foods, along with other dietary measures, is an effective answer to many health complaints and common conditions.
I'll bring to you authentic traditions of Oriental medicine with current, Western research-based nutrition tips.
The tasting, will guide you through the world of grains, fibre, fruits, as well as herbs, teas and infusions; raw recipes will be prepared together to be shared and enjoyed!
name: Cooking for Health: Naturopathic Nutrition with tasting!

description:
This evening is designed for lovers of wines and not necessarily for wine experts; Italian wines will be honored! "Wine-down" from your busy day in the coziness and grandeur of my original living room! The evening starts at 7.30 with the opportunity to meet and mingle with the other guests. You will find information about the wines you'll be tasting.

MINIMUM NUMBER OF PARTICIPANTS, 6 MAXIMUM 20 !!


In total, 1 bottle will be available for each guests under the form of 8 half glasses. 
If you like, you can buy your additional own bottle paying the price of it, plus the " droit de bouchon" of 5 euros.

The participation to the expenses is of 20 euro per person or 25 euro per person, if you like to taste organic cheeses and charcuteries with breads. Please write me here what would you like to subscribe for!
name: Italian wines hours!

description:
Piedmont (Piemonte) is in the northwestern corner of Italy. Famous for its wine and white truffles, the Piedmont region provides many culinary delights. This region is famous for 'bagna cauda',a garlic and anchovy dip for raw vegetables. Grissini, the slim breadsticks that are found on many Italian tables, have theirorigins in Piedmont. Handmade grissini are very crispy and thin, and can be up to one meter long. The forests produce greatwild mushrooms, which along with cardoons, are gathered and used in many dishes. The 'slow food' movement, the OldWorld's answer to the fast food revolution, was founded in Piedmont in 1986.Tajarin is the egg-yolk-rich pasta from the Piedmont region of Italy. Their golden color comes from the farmhouse egg yolks, which are almost orange in color, and their delicacy comes from being cut into strands from 1/8 to 1/4-inch wide. One of the original recipes called for using 30 egg yolks to a little over 2 pounds of flour!

We'll prepare this special pasta with 4 sauces:
1) with meat - Salsiccia e bietole
2) with vegetables - Carbonara di verdure
3) with cheese - Cacio e pepe alla Romana
4) with truffle oil - La Tartufata
name: Tajarin pasta, the Piedmontese!

description:
Today medical experts largely agree that there is a condition related to gluten other than celiac. In 2011 a panel of celiac experts convened in Oslo and settled on a medical term for this malady: non-celiac gluten sensitivity.
I will tell you more about that and about how modern wheat has been grown and transformed ; will teach you tips and we'll try some Italian recipes to enter the world of a gluten free diet.

spiedini di polenta al balsamico 

pesto di zucchine e zafferano 

sorbetto alla pesca
name: Gluten free, whether you need it or not!

description:
Dear food lovers I'd like you to choose a date for a cooking class, as this is  the Summer period and you can be interested in picking up a date! 

Please write me here and suggest dates that fits you! You can also  create a group of friends!  Remember, minimum number for a class is 6/8 people!
name: Let's meet up and cook  Italian!

description:
This is the 3rd of a 6 class to educate you, empower you and inspire you through food,  in line with my activity as a Jamie Oliver Volunteer for the global Food Revolution!

We have learned about the first food,  breathing and water, the chewing importance and the first Paleo diet.. now we will learn why and how to introduce grains and fiber on this healthy  raw fruits and vegs attitude;

Recipes on the go:  

                                                    

                                      RAW APPETIZERS  AND DRINKS

                                          POLPETTONE DI AVOCADO 

         PALEO ICE CREAM WITH RED,  WHITE FRUITS AND OAT CREAM
name: Revolutionize your way of eating, one step a day!

description:
What is certain is the meatballs and polpettone are born in Italy, and the first traces appears during the fifteenth century. They have known for centuries an undisputed success even though, in such a wide span of time, have changed several times theircomposition, cooking and presentation.
Absent in our fourteenth-century cookbooks, the term 'meatball' is born a century later, with the cuisine of Maestro Martino..

L'insalata di patate  e pomodori alla Siciliana

Il Polpettone della Nonna Angiolina , original recipe of the '50s in Calabria, with her fagiolini alla mollica croccante.

La Torta Sapori Mediterranei " Formaggio e Cioccolato bianco con salsa alle pesche e arancio '..............
name: Let's cook Italian: polpette and polpettone,an Italian story!

description:
Dear food lovers, this evening is dedicated to let you know more about my passion for cooking and traveling that has brought me to launch a different way of exploring the world of food. I hope, through this evening to let you flavor the many opportunities we have to be enjoy the world "Far from the madding crowd"...   

Come find out more about the "Escapades" I will organize in Italy and Ireland & get your questions answered! Attendance is free and open to anyone interested in knowing more about!
Perfumed waters and a glass of wine will be served!

Please RSVP if you’d like to attend
name: Presentation of my Italy and Ireland Culinary Trips and Escapades!

description: Food lovers, a last minute invitation to go together to Eat Brussels, at Bois de la Cambre! Meeting at 11.45 at Louise Metro Stop, in front of Hagen Daaz café or at my place 11.15!
name: Let's meet up and go to EAT BRUSSELS! LAST MINUTE GET TOGETHER!

description:
This evening is designed for lovers of wines and not necessarily for wine experts; Italian wines will be honored! "Wine-down" from your busy day in the coziness and grandeur of my original living room! The evening starts at 7.30 with the opportunity to meet and mingle with the other guests. In total, 1 bottle will be available for each guests under the form of 8 half glasses.

The participation to the expenses is of 20 euro per person or 25 euro per person, if you like to taste organic cheeses and charcuteries with breads. Please write me here what would you like to subscribe for!
name: "Italian wine's hours" is back!

description:
Healthy, nutritious food and breathing exercises are the simplest methods for relieving stress. These methods are not only cost effective but readily available – and without any side effects. Foods with high vitamin and mineral levels actively help to reduces stress levels.
Our best stress-busting tips and tricks and a light guided relaxation, different new herbal teas and perfumed waters, aromatic oils, secrets and knowledge.
name: How food can affect your stress level?

description:
A 3 days Gastronomy and lifestyle Meeting in Brussels to discover Tuscany.


Let's go together at a preferential rate and learn about Tuscan products!


It will be my pleasure to introduce you to the local Tuscan world offering a fine selection of wine appellations and varied origins as well wide range of products between conventional and novelties! Human encounter with all these producers will accentuate the emotions and flavors! 

 I will teach you how to cook products and make you enjoy the many facets of Tuscan cuisine, so quality based!

We will see young Tuscan cooks in action who will rock your taste buds, not to mention the presence of some great chefs of Italian cuisine in Belgium. Besides being able to discover, taste, learn, you'll have the opportunity to purchase the products to extend these pleasures at home with family and friends, if you'll wish!

As a Jamie Oliver Ambassador, I will have one or two dedicated time slots for a presentation of mines: I will talk about Slow Food, Natural Cooking and Ingredients with a special accent on Tuscany.
More details on the presentation , later on! Each day I will fix a meeting point and hour to be all together there: more details coming soon!
name: Let's Meetup and visit Saveurs Toscane 2014!

description:
Let's go together at a preferential rate and learn about Tuscan products!

It will be my pleasure to introduce you to the local Tuscan world offering a fine selection of wine appellations and varied origins as well wide range of products between conventional and novelties! Human encounter with all these producers will accentuate the emotions and flavors! I will teach you how to cook products and make you enjoy the many facets of Tuscan cuisine, so quality based!

We will see young Tuscan cooks in action who will rock your taste buds, not to mention the presence of some great chefs of Italian cuisine in Belgium. Besides being able to discover, taste, learn, you'll have the opportunity to purchase the products to extend these pleasures at home with family and friends, if you'll wish!

As a Jamie Oliver Ambassador, I will have one dedicated time slots for a presentation of mines: I will talk about Slow Food, Natural Cooking and Ingredients with a special accent on Tuscany.
name: Let's Meetup and visit Saveurs Toscane 2014!

description:
My favourite Family recipes shared with you during this cooking class!

AND FINALLY, WE WILL DO THE RISOTTO!!!!!!!!!!!
name: Let's meet up and cook  Italian! Finally, the RISOTTO, ma non solo! !!

description:
What is it?


A full 5 nights /6 days to dream, shop and taste the best food and wines ever in Rome

Who is it for?
For Gourmets, Travelers, Foodies, Fashionists and anyone willing to discover, be surprised, enjoy and learn!

When?


October 2014 Departures: second or third Sundays of the Month, which means Sunday the 12th or Sunday the 19th of October

Rome: One such treasure the entire world is envying, this is for you a unique opportunity of traveling with a local that is in love with her city, loves Food, Wine, Shopping, Art and Antiques…An inspirational tour to discover hidden corners and places, taste and enjoy unthinkable moments.

Departures will be confirmed if the minimum number of participants is reached: 7 people


Program Schedule

Sunday


 Afternoon
- Meeting of all participants @ Fiumicino Airport 5PM –Transfer with private van and chauffeur to the Hotel – Check in, time to discover the room and relax.
- 7.30: Meeting at the Hotel to reach Chez Cristina, our co-host and food specialist
- Discover “The Escape”: meet the hosts,Cristina and Gaia, and discover the amazing detailed program of the week while enjoying the delicious Roman Welcome Buffet. 

Monday

Morning

- Discover Borgo Pio and the Vatican, Rione Pigna: Piazza Navona and Pantheon Morning break: Visit to the St. Eustachio Cafe: Eustache Coffee is an ancient wood-burning roasting coffee place, born in the thirties, located in Rome, in front of the Senate of the Italian Republic, a step away from Piazza Navona and the Pantheon. Their coffee experience is unique! Lunch time: It will be very difficult for you not to taste the famous pizza al taglio of the “Forno di Campo de’ Fiori”. This Bakery has always been a point of reference in the district and with his delicacies has delighted famous palates.

Afternoon

- Discover Rione Parione and Rione Regola: Piazza Farnese, Piazza Capo di Ferro, Palazzo Spada and more… guided itinerary through Art, Food and Hidden places.

5PM Back to the Hotel 7PM The Italian Dinner Chez Cristina : share the incredibly nice table and Italian hospitality , enjoy the colors and flavors of the most incredible vegetables and specialties from an original cuisine of the south of Italy : Calabria and Sicilia. Take maximum advantage of seasonal vegetables and herbs from Cristina organic garden and local markets.

Tuesday

Morning


- Visit at the Castel Romano outlet: At Castel Romano Designer Outlet, you can find your favourite designer brands at up to 70% off, all year round. Is a beautiful different setting with cafes and restaurants, and more than 100 boutiques, something to offer for everyone. Ranging from iconic fashion brands like Valentino, Roberto Cavalli, Lacoste and Michael Kors to athletic labels, like Nike and Adidas, and casual favourites, like Guess and Diesel.
Free lunch


Afternoon

- Visit Eataly the biggest food store, mall and market with 4 floor entirely dedicated to Italian Food and being replicated in the States! But this is your real Italian time for food and cook’s shopping!
7.30 PM Unforgettable Fantasia di Pizza at La Pizza Luigi, out of the touristic path! Nominated as the oldest historic pizzeria of Rome and best roman pizza maker :alla 'nduja, ham and figues, pescatora, the tasty pizza Bianca withNutella e pinoli, as well as the original crostini alla Pala and awesome pizze bianche ripiene.

Wednesday


Morning

- Visit and shop at Campo Marzio, the Italian form of Latin Campus Martius, “Field of Mars”, a vast plain area enclosed between the River Tiber on one side, and the hilly part of the city on the other, dedicated to the God of War, Marte.
Today is the beautiful shopping area that includes one of the Rome’s most beloved sites by tourists, Piazza di Spagna, renowned for its Spanish Steps (1726), which lavishly climb to the church of Trinità dei Monty. Before it has been built, only a steep and rather rough slope climbed up to the top of the Pincio Hill.
Lunch time Discover Giolitti and the best ice-cream makers

Afternoon

- Trevi District with the most important monument in the area, Fontana di Trevi. In Via del Nazzareno a part of the aqueduct leading water to the Trevi Fountain can be seen. The shopping street Via del Corso is one of the most famous ones of its kind.
7.00 PM The Italian Wine Adventure and Dining Experience: learn the history of the first Italian grapes and wines,and flavor Italian special Breads, characteristic regional Salamis and Cheeses, matching the wines.

Thursday

Morning
- Colosseo, Aventino and Circo Massimo area ( Tempio delle Vestali – Bocca della Verità)
- The isola Tiberina
Lunch Time S Calisto and Baylon, the best Cappuccino! Learn the history of it!


Afternoon


- Trastevere: Come here during the autumn afternoon and get lost in it. Visit, shop…You may feel the ancient soul of this quarter. One of the few which kept its popular atmosphere.
5PM Back at the Hotel
7.30 PM The Pasta Experience Chez Cristina: Experiment the real pasta world, illustrating the best way of cooking and secret recipes. The search of the authentic taste has brought Cristina to experiment incredible combinations!

Friday

Morning
- Leaving the Hotel for a farewell drink and hand-made sandwiches and..    Arrivederci, a presto!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contribution to the costs:

1200 Euros per person

This includes:

2 Airport Transfers from and to Fiumicino Airport
6 days/5 nights at a 3 star hotel with breakfast VILLA EUR immerse in a beautiful park
4 Lunch breaks: 1 Ice cream – 1 Cappuccino – 1 Pizza al Taglio – 1 Coffee Experience
4 Italian Exceptional Dinners with regional and organic products on unique different table and crockery decorations
1 Wine Tasting and Delicatessen, home made Organic Breads and Cheeses
5 days Sightseeing and Transfers with Private Van and Driver
5 days Your personal historical Guide and Shopper, Gaia
1 Welcome Gift
1 Booklet of Italian original family recipes and tips
1 Booklet of secret and unique addresses for your personal Shopping experience in Rome!


A deposit of 600 Euros is required at the time of booking. The balance is due 30 days before the start of the program.

 1400 Euros per person


This includes:

2 Airport Transfers from and to Fiumicino Airport
6 days/5 nights at a 4 star hotel with breakfast SHANGRI-LA enjoy the swimming pool
4 Lunch breaks: 1 Ice cream – 1 Cappuccino – 1 Pizza al Taglio – 1 Coffee Experience
4 Italian Exceptional Dinners with regional and organic products on unique different table and crockery decorations
1 Wine Tasting and Delicatessen, home made Organic Breads and Cheeses
5 days Sightseeing and Transfers with Private Van and Driver
5 days Yourpersonal historical Guide and Shopper, Gaia
1 Welcome Gift
1 Booklet of Italian original family recipes and tips
1 Booklet of secret and unique addresses for your personal Shopping experience in Rome!


A deposit of 800 Euros is required at the time of booking. The balance is due 30 days before the start of the program. -----------------------------------------------


Not included in the fee:

Airfare and Traveling Insurance: the organizers will not be responsible for any kind of accident related to individual medical, travel, cooking activities, events.
We recommend that participants are covered by their own travel insurance policies.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For booking, enquiries and info please write to [masked]


Guests can elect on a daily basis to take one or more activities or skip a session and just chill out and enjoy roman surroundings as they wish.

The organizer reserves the right to make changes and amendments to the existing information material and/or the event in the case of unforeseen technical, organizational circumstances or acts of God.

The organizer also reserves the right to make changes to the program content and schedule.
name: Welcome to the ultimate Foodie’s Escapade: my hidden Rome!

description: The origin of tortellini is obscure although many legends lay claim to the origins of it. A strong local tradition has it that this dish was born in Castelfranco Emilia (province of Modena).[3] One night during a trip, Lucrezia Borgia checked into an inn in the small town and during the night the host became so captivated by Lucrezia's beauty that he could not resist the urge to peek into her room through the keyhole. The bedroom was lit by only a few candles, and so he could barely see her navel. This pure and innocent vision was enough to send him into an ecstasy that inspired him to create the tortellini that night.
name: Let's meet up and cook  Italian Tortellini, home made!

MINIMUM NUMBER ; 7 PEOPLE

Naturopathic Nutrition stresses the use of whole and organic foods as medicine - an integral concept of healing in many indigenous societies. Today, we see that a return to chemical-free foods, along with other dietary measures, is an effective answer to many health complaints and common conditions.
I'll bring to you authentic traditions of Oriental medicine with current, Western research-based nutrition tips.

description: We will enjoy cheese and charcuterie from Saveurs Toscanes, the Tuscan Fair where I bought incredible products! Quality is exceptional and wines will tell their stories!
name: Let's meetup and have a Tuscan Apero!

description:
Dear All, this special Dinner will be canceled, as we do not have enough participants and the time is short to decide and coordinate all the dishes...and the money collected for the Charity will not be enough!  :-(

New date trial:  2ndof November Just unsubscribe if you cannot make on the new date! 


A special  Sit - down Dinner,  Black Tie optional , where you are invited to dress up and bring one dish of your choice, in the following categories: 

STARTER    4 people

MAIN COURSE  3 people (myself I will prepare one of the 4)

DESSERT      4 people

WINE             4 people 

IF YOU ALL AGREE, I WAS THINKING TO GIVE OUR DONATION  TO HELP PEOPLE IN NEED OF FOOD IN BRUSSELS THROUGH                                                      http://www.servethecity.be/brussels/

     I discovered their website and I felt is the right one to send our donation

                             Any other suggestion is more than welcome!  

Black Tie Optional means exactly that: 


For GENTLEMEN
If you feel more comfortable in black tie or wish to convey your respect to your hosts or fellow guests, wear Black Tie. If you prefer not to dress so formally, a dark Lounge Suit will be sufficient. It means: dark colours are best for evening occasions. Very dark, if being worn to a 'Black Tie Optional' occasion.

During the day dark colours are most suitable in winter, and lighter colours in summer.

FOR LADIES
Ladies also get a free choice of evening wear. Anything from Evening Gown toCocktail dress would be more than suitable. Dressy separates could also be considered.

Obviously some guests will be wearing Black Tie, so all clothing should be of the highest quality!


More details later!!! 

Gaia
name: 'Classique d'Elegance'  Dinner!
Let's meet up and cook Italian!

description:
The long-awaited Christmas/End of the Cooking Year dinner is back! This year, given the great demand, two dates will be engaged in order to give more people the chance to participate!

For the new ones, this is the annual dinner I prepare myself for you after all your hard work during the classes! 

I will cook, finally! ;) for you, you will enjoy for once my selection of dishes for Christmas!

THE DINNERS WILL TAKE PLACE IF THE MINIMUM NUMBER OF PARTICIPANTS IS REACHED: 10 PEOPLE

PAYMENT IS REQUIRED AS SOON AS THE NUMBER OF PARTICIPANT IS REACHED, THROUGH MY BANK ACCOUNT THAT WILL BE COMMUNICATED TO EACH OF YOU.
name: Let's Meet up and have the 2014 Christmas Dinner ! First edition

description:
Second date to subscribe for the Final Christmas dinner cooked by me!
The dinner will take place if the MINIMUM NUMBER OF PARTICIPANTS WILL BE REACHED: 10 PEOPLE
name: Let's Meet up and have the 2014 Christmas Dinner ! Second edition

description:
Let's travel together back in time, to the wonderful Ghan House, an oasis of Georgian ambience, gardens and fine dining with beautiful views from every room of Carlingford Lough, The Mourne mountains or Slieve Foy. An hidden gem…ideal to unwind and relax as well as providing the perfect structure and ambiance for a high standing cooking trip.

We will offer you a unique hands on opportunity to participate to an Italian VIP cooking experience! Ghan House is a fully restored Georgian House with an award winning restaurant and superb accommodation, just one hour from Dublin and Belfast.

The combination of old world charm allayed with modern requirements seamlessly dovetail together to give a thoroughly unique experience.

Enjoy the comforts of a private bar, log fires & candlelight…

We will share with you techniques, Italian well and best kept family secrets and special ingredients The Award winning team in the kitchen is led by Head Chef Stephane Le Sourne and all overseen by Paul Carrol, your international perfect host; her mother Joyce Carrol, is attending the herbal and vegetable gardens, taking care of the flowers in the house and preparing incredible cakes and preserves.

Wake up in the morning and enjoy with us the Breakfast Experience , with local and home made products…it will make your day just a perfect one!

This VIP Cooking Escapade is all about special landscapes,incredibly nice people, Best natural products, High level Cooking, History and new friends!

Join us for a memorable week of culinary and great activities in the historical area of Carlingford!

Ghan House, Carlingford Lough, Ireland: a 2 AA Rosettes 2011 – 2014

Winner of Best Hotel and Country House Restaurant in County Louth, for 3 continuous years. Restaurant Association of Ireland

16 continuous years of “Best 100 places to stay in Ireland” – 1998 to 2014

Best 100 Wedding Venues in Ireland[masked] – One Fab Day Wedding Guide TRAVEL WITH ELEGANCE AND LEARN TO COOK – GAIA, THE VIP COOK’S ESCAPE TO IRELAND


Sunday Arrivel at Dublin Airport -Meeting point to Private Shuttle at 5PM – Transfer to Carlingford, Ghan House and check in to accommodation.
7.30 pm Light evening buffet, by Ghan House – Meet the Hosts and enjoy the Program’s Presentation.

Monday 10 AM -Hands-on cookery with Gaia in the morning followed by lunch, eating what you’ve cooked

After lunch – visit to the Carlingford Oyster Farm, taste the Carlingford Oysters, glass of Champagne. Time dependent on tide being out.

7.30 PM - 3 course, fully served dinner, at Ghan House Tuesday 9 AM Coach trip to Giant’s Causeway
Alternative: Massage, Seaweed bath or Carlingford Lough boat trip

6 to 7.30 PM Wine Tasting by one of Ghan House wine suppliers 7.30 PM Italian Buffet spread, prepared by Gaia

Wednesday 10 AM Hands-on cookery with Gaia in the morning followed by lunch, eating what you’ve cooked. 2.30 to 5pm Mythological trip of The Cooley Peninsula, organised by Ghan House

Evening Free to do and eat what you like on the beautiful Carlingford village, offering great dining

Thursday 10 AM Cookery Demonstration by Gaia and buffet lunch of what she has demonstrated

2pm to 3.30pm Historical guided walk of Medieval Carlingford

2pm to 5.30pm or) Guided walk on Slieve Foy Mountain

7.30pm 6 course tasting dinner last night evening dinner at Ghan House

Friday

Leaving for Dublin Airport

Costs, per person, inc VAT;

5 nights , 6 days single  or double occupancy accommodation,

  Sub total, single occupancy    €1300

                      sharing    €1200

MIN. 7 PEOPLE
